attributes.action: Re-Nationalise the railways, Land Rover, Jaguar, Coal Pits and London underground free of Communist/Extreme left wing interference/corruption, and have them run on a business model.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the people of Great Britan, ask that the Prime Minister Gordon Brown consider the option of re-nationalising the railways, Land Rover, Jaguar, The Coal Mines and London Underground free of Communist/Extreme left wing interference or corruption, and have them run on a business model, so they are able to run as efficient businesses, unlike the Public Sector Services of the 1970's/80's.
